# Hydro Benchmarks Repository

This repository contains performance benchmarks for Hydro/DFIR comparing with timely and differential-dataflow.

## Links

- [Main Hydro Repository ðŸ”—](https://github.com/BigWeaverServiceCanaryZetaIad/bigweaver-agent-canary-hydro-zeta)

- [Latest Benchmarks]({{ "/criterion/report/" | prepend: site.github.url | replace: 'https://', '//' }})

## About

These benchmarks were migrated from the main Hydro repository to:
- Reduce dependency footprint in the main repository
- Improve build times for core development
- Maintain dedicated performance testing infrastructure
- Enable performance comparisons with timely and differential-dataflow
